Trigger.Name: J Wave
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:Brute Justice gains the effect of Damage Up

Trigger.Name: DPS Restraining Order
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Restraining Order.

Trigger.Name: DPS Shared Sentence
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Shared Sentence.

Trigger.Name: Healer CC bait
Trigger.RegularExpression: recovers from the effect of Shared Sentence.

Trigger.Name: Main Tank (Super Jump)
Trigger.RegularExpression: recovers from the effect of Shared Sentence.

Trigger.Name: Off Tank (Stack)
Trigger.RegularExpression: recovers from the effect of Shared Sentence.

Trigger.Name: Image Auras
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of (?<debuff>Aggravated Assault|Shared Sentence|Restraining Order)

Trigger.Name: No Debuff
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of (Aggravated Assault|Shared Sentence|Restraining Order)

Trigger.Name: Trigger Listener
Trigger.Description: Checks if Inception is cast, sets $inceptiontime to 1, sets it back to 0 after 30000ms (tentative time)

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: One Left to Robot, Third Puddle
Two Right to Robot, Third Puddle

Trigger.Name: DPS House Arrest
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of House Arrest

Trigger.Name: DPS Restraining Order
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Restraining Order

Trigger.Name: Tank/Healer House Arrest
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of House Arrest

Trigger.Name: Tank/Healer Restraining Order
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Restraining Order

Trigger.Name: Aggravated Assault
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Aggravated Assault

Trigger.Name: Trigger Listener
Trigger.RegularExpression: 00:0044:Alexander Prime:I am Alexander...the Creator. You...who would prove yourself worthy of your utopia...will be judged.

Trigger.Name: Contact - TTS
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Final Word: Contact (?<contact>Regulation|Prohibition)

Trigger.Name: Escape - TTS
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Final Word: Escape (?<escape>Prohibition|Detection)

Trigger.Name: Contact - Image
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Final Word: Contact (?<contact>Regulation|Prohibition)

Trigger.Name: Escape - Image
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Final Word: Escape (?<escape>Prohibition|Detection)

Trigger.Name: Irresistible Grace
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4894:Perfect Alexander starts using Irresistible Grace on (?<player>(?<name>[\w-']+) [\w-']+)

Trigger.Name: Text and Callout
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Compressed (?<debuff>Lightning|Water) from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: Countdown Timer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Compressed Water from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: Image Auras
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Compressed (?<debuff>Lightning|Water) from (.*?)? for (?<duration>[0-9]{2})\.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: Water Resistance Down
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{1,31}) gains the effect of Water Resistance Down II

Trigger.Name: DPS Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Αα]

Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Δδ]

Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Γγ]

Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Δδ]

Trigger.Name: T/H Alpha
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Αα]

Trigger.Name: T/H Beta
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Ββ]

Trigger.Name: T/H Gamma
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi [Γγ]

Trigger.Name: Final Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Final Decree Nisi (?<nType>[α-ωΑ-Ω])

Trigger.Name: Double Rocket Punch
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4847:Brute Justice starts using Double Rocket Punch

Trigger.Name: Wet Healer
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Compressed Water

Action.Description: Save your own clone's ID in variable cloneID
Fate Calibration Header (Move me!) | Toggle to enable/disable images
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection α
Set FateAB variable for Fate Projection β
Sort clonelist after list has been made
Fire Clone TTS Trigger if variables are sufficient
Fire Clone Image Trigger if variables are sufficient
Unset obsolete scalar variables at Fate Calibration cast finish
Unset clonelist at Fate Calibration cast finish
Deactivate images at real Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament
